summary: the opening shot of villanelle and niko was intentionally shot at crotch level... def the battle of BDE. and I honestly think...
question: the opening shot of villanelle and niko was intentionally shot at crotch level... def the battle of BDE. and I honestly think eve’s marriage will be officially over by the end of the ep. niko can’t keep up
answer:
no he cannot! they probably don’t want to do a cheating storyline (even thought that would be really hot and eve is already emotionally cheating on him) so they don’t further alienate eve from the audience. she’s been kind of a shit lately, and they don’t want us to hate her. it would make sense they divorce them first before anything happens between villanelle. im patient. i can wait. i’ll bide my time.


this isn’t my first rodeo, emerald fennell

summary: Ch 4: La Villanelle - A Killing Eve Fanfic
title: Ch 4: La Villanelle - A Killing Eve Fanfic
excerpt: The mundane reality of every day life crashes Eve and Villanelle's bubble. While Eve can't stop thinking about the assassin, Villanelle finds an outlet for her teeming rage in the new contract.
description:
Feeling like Eve had forgotten all about her, Villanelle goes hard on her new assassination contract. Meanwhile, Eve has to tackle her normal life again and face some very stupid choices she made.

summary: The subway scene in Killing Eve
title: The subway scene in Killing Eve
body:
Eve had this urge to push the man in the subway just to see what happens. Much like a psychopath would. 

In my opinion the scene wanted to show that Eve was changing and sort of acknowledging certain traits she has in her that until now she was always suppressing but now with Villanelle those traits are kind of awaken. Or at least she finds it harder to suppress them. 

You can also see the way she is ready to do all just to get what she wants – like with her boss’ son and the way she treats him every time he refuses to follow her orders. He notices the changes in her too. 

This little moment in the subway also shows us that Eve and Villanelle are not really that different. They, in fact, have more in common than Eve thinks. It’s funny really because Eve awakens feelings and humanity in Villanelle while Villlanelle awakens Eve’s darker side :D 

And I just need to say that I absolutely love the second season!!! To me it’s even better than the first!!!

summary:
KILLING EVE • 
This right here, is what you call acting at its best. My personal opinion, i’ve not seen a better actor than...
body:
KILLING EVE •

This right here, is what you call acting at its best. My personal opinion, i’ve not seen a better actor than Jodie Comer in a long time. How she portrays Villanelle isn’t just as a simple psychopath/assassin; she portrays her with danger, heart, vulnerability, strength, power. How you can switch from this to this in one scene is pure genius. Sandra Oh is goooood, but she’s in a world of her own. If this doesn’t earn her the awards i don’t know what will. the BAFTA is surely HERS. 👏🏼 Villanelle has gone from being one of my fav TV characters to genuinely one of my fav characters of all time.

If this doesn’t earn her the awards i don’t know what will. the BAFTA is surely HERS. 👏🏼 Villanelle has gone from being one of my fav TV characters to genuinely one of my fav characters of all time.

blog.description:
In theory a writing blog, in practice mostly pretty pictures, fandom, religion, shitposting, and whining about various humanities and social sciences disciplines.
Please read my About page before following.

tags: give me love give me memes
question: KE Asks: London, Moscow, Oxford?
answer:
london: what is your dream job?

Something in adult education, probably involving ESL, while writing a lot (and in all sorts of genres) on the side.

moscow: can you do any accents other than your own?

Not really. I used to be able to do a pretty good British RP (appropriately for a British show) but no longer can.

For reference, my own accent is very close to General American but with some New England-specific lexical items (and one South Jersey/Southeastern Pennsylvania-specific one, “hoagie”) and a mild intrusive r that I picked up while living in Boston.

oxford: what is your favourite thing to learn about?

All things considered, probably history.

Killing Eve Asks

tags: give me love give me memes
question: Paris, bacon, M16?
answer:
paris: what language(s) do you want to learn?

Discounting Japanese because I technically already know it and just need more opportunities to practice it in the real world, I really want to pick up more Italian.

bacon: what does your ideal sunday look like?

Church, practicing piano, maybe a long walk, either by myself or with a friend or family member.

MI6: if you had the opportunity to work as a spy, would you take it?

I’ve genuinely considered being some sort of intelligence agent in the past, but I personally don’t love America quite enough to put myself into physical danger abroad.

Killing Eve Asks
